actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Stafford with a preamble. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 1012.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution ordering a space needs study of Social Security Data Processing Center in Wilkes-Barre, Pennsylvania, including a site survey for proposed relocation thereof, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Declares that it is the sense of the Senate that the Army Corps of Engineers shall study the space needs of the Social Security Administration Data Processing Center in Wilkes-Barre, Pennsylvania, and report its findings to the Senate and recommendations. Requires the Army Corps of Engineers, from time to time, to study and report to the Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works on other public building matters as requested by such committee.

titles.title: A resolution ordering a space needs study of Social Security Data Processing Center in Wilkes-Barre, Pennsylvania, including a site survey for proposed relocation thereof, and for other purposes.
